room_title: Escape room "The (Un)Common room" by Escape on Purpose in Raleigh - Durham
room_description:
You make a wrong turn on a road trip one night because sometimes GPSs just suck. You end up at an odd B&B at the edge of town. Your gut tells you to leave, but the innkeepers beg you to stay and help figure out the mystery of the Inn's common room.
They seem sincere so you stay. Is it normal for curtains to shimmer and candles to light themselves? Perhaps this B&B's common room is not so common after all. You have an hour to solve this mystery or risk being locked in this room forever! ...freakin GPSs.
